tool_description: Validates app icons against platform requirements including size, format, design guidelines, and generates required icon variants.

icon_url.description: URL or path to the app icon file

platform.description: Target platform: ios, android, or both

generate_variants.description: Whether to generate all required icon sizes

error_messages: Invalid icon format: Icon must be in PNG or SVG format.
Resolution too low: Icon resolution is below minimum requirements.
Design guideline violation: Icon doesn't meet platform design standards.
Invalid platform: Platform must be 'ios', 'android', or 'both'.
File not found: Cannot access the provided icon URL or path.
usage: Provide icon_url and platform. Set generate_variants to create all required icon sizes. Returns validation results and generated icon variants.

validation_passed.description: Whether the icon passes all validation checks

generated_icons.description: URLs to generated icon variants with size information
